title: Eaten
description: “Something inside Amelia changed when she realized what she had done. She was killing these people, people that never even hurt her, people that cared about her. She remembered feeling similar to this when she saw the small children playing in the park. 'What a horrible person I am.'” Amelia Everheart: the center of an abusive household where nothing seems to go right and bad habits go unnoticed. Will one bad habit be the end? Contracting a vicious infection, Amelia struggles with the voices inside her head and her rapidly deteriorating body. Knowing what she is doing is wrong, but having no say in it, Amelia spreads her infection to those she loves. She is under the man’s control as his next victims will be. As more people get infected, the man’s lust for power grows. Nothing can survive a force like the man.Discover the horrors the man has planned for our world in Eaten, a novel by Alyanna Poe.
author: Alyanna Poe
